name: Role of the Dice (Scott, Sofia Chupakhina, Aru Ayyappan)
name_original: Role of the Dice (Scott, Sofia Chupakhina, Aru Ayyappan)
description:
Play as a party of dice (Ranger, Cleric and Wizard) who are on a journey back to their bag of dice in The Lands Between.... the empty pizza boxes. Help the party slay their foes and defeat the boss left by the DM. 

  • Turn based combat with three adorable dice characters
  • Sprawling D&D table session inspired world to explore
  • Different fearsome enemies and an epic boss battle to conquer
  • A quirky and fun narrative 
Controls

Left Mouse click to move forward and back on the screen or A & D on the Keyboard
